name: Death Nearing
description:
Our stay safe jam game. It is simple horror game but  every decision will change ending of your game .In game there are a 7 different ending.

-Spoiler-

Ending 1:Killing by jason

Ending 2:Dying in wardrobe

Ending 3:Stepping on oil

Ending 4:Prank

Ending 5:Hitting by firetruck

Ending 6:Killing in street by jason

Ending 7:Jail
